issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add benchmarks for COUNT(DISTINCT)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10510](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10510). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add benchmarks for `COUNT(DISTINCT)` queries, which were introduced in ARROW-10043. 

A number of implementation suggestions/ideas came up in the ARROW-10043 [pull request](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8222), and having benchmarks will help evaluate the different options.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10510?focusedCommentId=17227825) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8606
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8606>
